# googleforms_drive_file (Data Source)

Retrieves a Google Drive file by ID.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Drive file ID.

### Optional

- `supports_all_drives` (Boolean) Whether to support shared drives when reading metadata.

### Read-Only

- `mime_type` (String) Drive mimeType.
- `name` (String) File name.
- `parent_ids` (List of String) Current Drive parent folder IDs (best-effort).
- `trashed` (Boolean) Whether the file is trashed.
- `url` (String) Drive webViewLink URL (if available).
